title: Watch: Woman Screams 'Walmart Is Racist' As She Was Being Arrested... For Slapping A Cop
description:
A video of a woman at a Walmart in New York is circulating on social media after footage showed her slapping a state trooper who proceeded to pin her to the ground while she cried "Walmart is racist.”

title: Anti-Cop Progressives March On Seattle Mayor's Private Property After He Announced He Was FUNDING The Police
description:
Defund the Police protesters marched to Seattle Mayor Bruce Harrell's home on Sunday, after he announced an increase of $17 million for the police department.

According to Fox News, the protest was called "Justice for Jaahnavi," in regard to a college student who was fatally struck by a police car in January.

The funding increase, which is expected to total $391 million next year, is meant to target the increase in crime and response times being on the rise. The funds will go to

title: After Patriotic Student Walkout, School District Votes That Male Students Can't Use The Girls' Bathroom Anymore
description:
The Perkiomen Valley school board passed a bathroom policy on Monday night just weeks after voting it down.

Although you would think we wouldn't need such a policy for something that was once considered common sense for the majority of human existence, students are now required to use the bathroom that aligns with their biological sex.

title: Man Charged In Gang Rape Of Minnesota Girl; 11 Illegal Migrants Processed At Scene
description:
A man has been charged for the alleged gang rape of an 11-year-old girl, and 11 others who were detained at the scene are being processed by border patrol after police executed a search warrant at the suspected site of a pedophilic gang rape in Bemidji, Minnesota.


Man charged in alleged gang rape of 11-year-old girl at Bemidji home www.youtube.

title: Watch: Plus-Size Influencer Calls For Hotels To Widen Hallways, Lifts And Bathrooms
description:

Now, it's not even safe in the harbor. Boats in San Francisco Bay are being raided by pirates.

title: "Way to cheat, bro:" Dude ranked 172nd in high school track. Then he became a girl. Now she's ranked 4th!
description:
Soren Stark-Chessa was a struggling high school track star in Maine, ranking only 172nd in the 5k as a freshman. Over the summer, he decided he'd always been a girl and transitioned into one. Now as a sophomore, SHE is the 4th ranked runner in girls' competitions!

Unfortunately, not everyone is as impressed with the beautiful bravery.

— (@)

As Stark-Chessa finished 5th in this past weekend's Maine XC Festival of Champions, a hecker could be heard yelling "way to cheat, bro" and "nice job, bro." In this instance, "bro" is being used as a pejorative because it is used to imply that Soren is a guy and not a girl. Even though he is every bi

title: Dolphins QB shocks reporters by professing his Christian Faith: "It’s been a little tough having to play on Sundays"
description:
It's sad that hearing public figures like athletes having the courage to openly talk about their Christianity is so rare that it's noteworthy. Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa professing the importance of Jesus Christ in his life is worth being amplified.

The Dolphins went into NFL Week 4 looking like an unstoppable juggernaut... until they went up against my Buffalo Bills. Nothing against the Fish. But the Bills lost to the Jets in Week 1, and Josh Allen took that personally. They've outscored opponents 123 - 33 since and handed the Dolphins their first loss of the season.

Tua was asked how he handles and bounces back from a loss like this. The QB said losing isn't the end of the world when you have the Good Lord.

"It’s been a little tough having to play on Sundays," Tua said before sharing he relies

title: "Being an absolute WHORE to get in on his 51 million": MLB star speaks out after being falsely accused of sexual assault
description:
Former Los Angeles Dodgers star Trevor Bauer posted a video to X giving his side of false sexual assault allegations. He included text messages and a video the girl, Lindsey Hill, took of him in bed and without his knowledge after she claimed she was sexually assaulted. Spoiler: Lindsey Hill was not sexually assaulted.

The bulk of the text messages came out during a restraining order hearing where the judge ruled against Lindsey Hill after Lindsey Hill had misled the court. The judge said Lindsey Hill's claims were "materially misleading," and also found that "no sexual assault or non-consensual conduct took place."

After this, Bauer sued Lindsey Hill who then counter-sued him. Both cases were dropped, allowing Bauer to FINALLY give his side of the story and expose Lindsey Hill for being a liar with the evidence th
